creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: Zodiac calendar with 6 two-sided wooden plaques, decorated with motifs of the 12 animals of the traditional Chinese zodiac (a–f); holder in shape of hanging scroll (g)
marks: Signatures and Seals a) recto: R side: Made on a certain day in 1846 by
medium: Gold and silver maki-e and shell inlay on lacquered wood
title: Zodiac calendar with holder in the shape of a hanging scroll
